product_name: Arc'teryx Beta LT Hybrid Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Arc'teryx Beta LT Hybrid Jacket for men employs two types of GORE-TEX(R) to deliver a supple, durable waterproof/breathable hard shell that's super lightweight and packs down small. Compact, lightweight GORE-TEX fabric with Paclite technology is used in the main body. Key high-wear areas are reinforced with N40p GORE-TEX 3L with tricot technology. WaterTight(TM) pit zips vent excess heat instantly. WaterTight center-front zipper delivers weather protection. Helmet-compatible DropHood(TM) features a full, stand-alone collar and 1-handed cinch cords; hood rotates with the head without obscuring vision. The Arc'teryx Beta LT Hybrid Jacket for men offers zippered hand pockets for secure storage of essentials.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Beta LT Hybrid Jacket for men employs two types of GORE-TEX(R) to deliver a supple, durable waterproof/breathable hard shell that's super lightweight and packs down small.
